price: फिर हमने उनके पश्चात् दूसरे समुदाय को पैदा किया।
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
